llm_res.rule: Clients SHOULD make sure to create user interfaces in such a way that they set the allowance first to 0 before setting it to another value for the same spender. THOUGH The contract itself shouldn’t enforce it, to allow backwards compatibility with contracts deployed before.
The function SHOULD throw unless the _from account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism.
Transfers of 0 values MUST be treated as normal transfers and fire the Transfer event.

MUST trigger when tokens are transferred, including zero value transfers. A token contract which creates new tokens SHOULD trigger a Transfer event with the _from address set to 0x0 when tokens are created.
